text: Democratic Leaders Tried to Crush Zohran Mamdani.  They Should Have Been Taking Notes.  —  On Tuesday night, Zohran Mamdani shocked the political establishment.  There are lessons that national Democrats should take from his strong showing in the Democratic primary for mayor of New York City.

Zohran delivered the Democratic establishment the thrashing it deserved  —  Zohran Mamdani, a previously obscure state assemblyman who polled at as little as 1 percent in early surveys of the race, became the Democratic nominee for mayor of New York City on Tuesday.
